nodes.text: Does one have to be a FFL to sell a firearm one owns? '33 states do not restrict private, intrastate sales of firearms at gun shows in any manner.' Gun show - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

And we've already presented, countless times in the past, that all evidence points to less than 1% of guns recovered from crimes being traced back to gun shows. Ergo there is no emergency that needs to be addressed by forcing private citizens to carry out documented transfers in a business setting.
